title: Death Knight - Novel Updates
author: Protector Of Time   时间的守护者
description:
Fate really exists. 

People cannot choose where, when, and in what environment they are born. Because of this, from the moment of birth, unfairness is already seared into the soul. 

The world is just cruel like that, and naturally so. 

However, even though life is only a tiny ray of light flowing in history, even though the soul is only a weak spark cycling in the underworld, even though an ordinary person must rely only on his own strength to struggle to survive in this cruel world...I still...

I still must in the name of God, order you...

To live on~>
